message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $137.50?
I'm getting close, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $132?
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm not going to go below $135. How about we meet at $136?
I'm still a bit short, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to go down to $133?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. How about we meet at $134?
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $131?
